name: Del Hoge Veluwe
description: An overcast day in this national park of Netherlands. Inside it is the Kroller Muller museusm, home to the second largest collection of Van Gogh paintings. I remember this setting fondly -- very few people were at the park. The silence was deafening.

name: Windmills
description: I was lucky to be able to see the windmills of Zaanse Schans under a clear blue sky at the start of November. The water was calm, as was the afternoon sun. I found the green tip of the base and the orange wings to be pleasing given their contrast to the blueness all around.

name: An Afternoon Break
description: Amsterdam has many parks, but Vondelpark may be the most famous. I spotted a moment of simple solitude, which I think more people ought to find joy in. I know not what that man was truly feeling, but I tell myself it was peace.

name: Friend at the Canal
description: I made the acquaintance of a woman who was journaling at a bench near me. I was sketching at the time, and thought it would be nice to make a painting with a figure as the strong focus. I asked her if she would mind being in the painting, and she agreed. As it turns out, she was an illustrator! We had much to discuss.
